nodes.text: Soburi Hannemtin was a fair skinned human male with black hair, who worked as a croupier at the Canto Casino in the city of Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica. He wore a green waistcoat with yellow patterning in casino livery over a white shirt with a red shimmersilk cumberbund, as well as black pants with red and yellow patterning and a black hat.

Soburi Hannemtin first appeared in the film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, which was released on December 15, 2017. The character was not named in the film, but received identification in Star Wars: The Last Jedi: The Visual Dictionary, a reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo and released in conjunction with the film.
